name: Early Pandy Days
description: A visual and audio collage of interconnected New Orleans experiences during the COVID-19 lockdown. Conceptualized and experienced by Marta Rodriguez Maleck & Zac Manuel.  Edited by Marta Rodriguez Maleck. Shot by Zac Manuel. Marta Rodriguez Maleck is an installation artist, storyteller, and filmmaker. Zac Manuel is an Oscar-nominated cinematographer. They both live and work in New Orleans with their angelic cat, Naila.
